explanation:
{{notice|Despite being categorised as comic #7, this was actually the first xkcd comic released by Randall. To learn more, read the [[LiveJournal|history of xkcd]].}} {{comic | number = 7 | date = September 30, 2005 | title = Girl sleeping (Sketch -- 11th grade Spanish class) | ognumber = 1 | ogtitle = Girl sleeping | oglink = https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001941/http://xkcd-drawings.livejournal.com/?skip=40#:~:text=8%3A34%20pm-,Girl%20sleeping,-I%20drew%20this | ognext = 4 | ogprev = 7 | image = girl_sleeping_noline_(1).jpg | titletext = I don't remember her name at all, but she fell asleep on the floor in front of me.

''[https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001941/http://xkcd-drawings.livejournal.com/?skip=40#:~:text=8%3A34%20pm-,Girl%20sleeping,-I%20drew%20this Original caption]:'' I drew this in 11th-grade Spanish class. We were watching a movie and she was asleep on the floor in front of me. }} This was the first comic [[LiveJournal|originally posted to LiveJournal]]. The next one was [[4: Landscape (sketch)]]. It was among the [[:Category:First day on LiveJournal|first thirteen comics]] posted to LiveJournal within 12 minutes on September 30, 2005, on the first day of the xkcd LiveJournal account. ==Explanation== This comic depicts a girl sleeping on the floor of [[Randall]]'s 11th-grade Spanish class, presumably during a movie as shown in the [https://web.archive.org/web/20070927001941/http://xkcd-drawings.livejournal.com/?skip=40#:~:text=8%3A34%20pm-,Girl%20sleeping,-I%20drew%20this original caption]. The title text on [https://xkcd.com xkcd.com] explains that Randall didn't know her name, but she was sleeping on the floor, and so he decided to draw her. It is possible that Randall found the girl attractive, which would have motivated him to draw her. ==Transcript== :[Girl sleeping on her side, head to the left, facing away from view.] ==Trivia== *This is the first comic drawn on [[:Category:Checkered paper|checkered paper]]. *This drawing would be used again in [[1506: xkcloud]] as one of the "[[1506: xkcloud/Pictures of other pages#Help! We lost the text|Help! We lost the text]]" images given by Randall. {{comic discussion}} [[Category:Posted on LiveJournal| 01]] [[Category:First day on LiveJournal| 01]] [[Category:First day on xkcd.com]] [[Category:Checkered paper]] [[Category:Sketches]]
